de.nec.nle.siafu.control.progress

Interface Progress

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleProgress, GUIProgress

    public interface Progress
    An interface for the simulator to report on the loading of a simulation. By telling the user what Siafu is doing, he will hopefully put up with it.
    Author:
    Miquel Martin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reportBackgroundCreated()
      Report that one of the backgrounds has now been created.
      void reportBackgroundCreationEnd()
      Report that the creation of backgrounds has been finished.
      void reportBackgroundCreationStart(int amount)
      Report on the beginning of creation of amount darkened background.
      void reportCacheElementLoaded()
      Report that one element has been put into the cache.
      void reportCachePrefill(int amountOfElements)
      Report that the cache is now being filled up to amountOfElements.
      void reportCachePrefillEnded()
      Report the end of the cache prefill.
      void reportCreatingAgents()
      Report on starting the creation of agents.
      void reportPlaceCreated(String type)
      Report that a new place has been created.
      void reportPlacesFound(String type, int amount)
      Report on a new place type being read from the images.
      void reportSimulationEnded()
      Report on the simulation haveing ended.
      void reportSimulationStarted()
      Report on the simulation haveing started.
      void reportWorldCreation(String worldName)
      Report that we started creating the world.

    • Method Detail

      • reportWorldCreation

        void reportWorldCreation(String worldName)
        Report that we started creating the world.
        Parameters:
        worldName - the name of the world

      • reportCachePrefill

        void reportCachePrefill(int amountOfElements)
        Report that the cache is now being filled up to amountOfElements.
        Parameters:
        amountOfElements - the amount of elements loaded so far.

      • reportCacheElementLoaded

        void reportCacheElementLoaded()
        Report that one element has been put into the cache.

      • reportCachePrefillEnded

        void reportCachePrefillEnded()
        Report the end of the cache prefill.

      • reportPlacesFound

        void reportPlacesFound(String type,
                     int amount)
        Report on a new place type being read from the images.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of place
        amount - how many places of that type have been found

      • reportPlaceCreated

        void reportPlaceCreated(String type)
        Report that a new place has been created. This is quick if the place gradient is already persisted, but takes a while if it has to be calculated. Hence the need for the progress bar.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the place that has just been created

      • reportCreatingAgents

        void reportCreatingAgents()
        Report on starting the creation of agents.

      • reportSimulationStarted

        void reportSimulationStarted()
        Report on the simulation haveing started.

      • reportSimulationEnded

        void reportSimulationEnded()
        Report on the simulation haveing ended.

      • reportBackgroundCreationStart

        void reportBackgroundCreationStart(int amount)
        Report on the beginning of creation of amount darkened background.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of backgrounds being created

      • reportBackgroundCreated

        void reportBackgroundCreated()
        Report that one of the backgrounds has now been created.

      • reportBackgroundCreationEnd

        void reportBackgroundCreationEnd()
        Report that the creation of backgrounds has been finished.
